articles.description: COVID-19 is 'yet one more health problem exacerbated by the obesity pandemic,' researchers argue in an editorial, citing available evidence.
articles.content: As evidence mounts that overweight and obese people are at much greater risk of developing life threatening COVID-19 consequences, public health experts have called on manufacturers to stop promoting… [+4417 chars]
